body.p: To access the DITA Logging preferences page, and go to DITA Logging . This preferences page includes the following sections and options:

dt.uicontrol: Show the following types of messages in a new tab

dlentry.dd:
This section allows you to specify which types of messages will be displayed in separate tabs in the message panel at the bottom of the editor if a DITA transformation results in errors or warnings. You can choose whether or not to display the following types of messages:
DITA-OT errors
DITA-OT warnings
DITA-OT info
FOP errors
FOP warnings
FOP info
XSLT problems
